title: Cellular Automaton
description: A simple simulation of the life cycle of cells. Watch populations evolve over generations. By Harry Bendekgey
instructions: Click to place living cells, and press play to watch them evolve. Whether a cell live or dies (or comes to life) is decided by how many neighbors it has. Edit the rules and see how it affects evolution. By Harry Bendekgey
keywords: React.js | Cellular Automaton | Conway's Game of Live | Harry Bendekgey
